scripts.heroku-prebuild: echo This runs before Heroku installs dependencies. && cd client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.heroku-postbuild: echo This runs after Heroku installs dependencies, but before Heroku prunes and caches dependencies.
scripts.heroku-cleanup: echo This runs after Heroku prunes and caches dependencies.
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run custom-tests && echo 'Done.'
scripts.custom-tests: echo "(No other custom tests yet.)" && echo
